javadoc: Listener that is notified when a thread completes its task.

methods.javadoc:
Notification that the task completed.
@param task the task that was running and is now completed
methods.name: taskCompleted

params.name: task
params.comment: the task that was running and is now completed

methods.javadoc:
Notification that the task was canceled.
@param task the task that was running and was canceled
methods.name: taskCancelled
methods.comment: Notification that the task was canceled.

params.name: task
params.comment: the task that was running and was canceled

name: TaskListener
comment: Listener that is notified when a thread completes its task.
